title: MergeMine Idle
description: MergeMine Idle is an idle clicker game with a merge element in the game. Click on the enemies in the danger zone to earn money and use it to buy the shovels. Merge the same shovels to make them more durable, and start digging. Get resources and try to get as deep as you can. After you get the resources, make powerful weapons from them so you can use them to fight against dangerous monsters!
